name: Platformer Project (Unity Asset)
description:
How to play it (keyboard or XBOX controller):

  • Movement: Arrow Keys or Left Thumb.
  • Jumping: "Space" key or "A" button.
  • Dive: "Z" or "X" button.

The Platformer Project is available at Unity's Asset Store: https://u3d.as/2GNb

NOTE: WebGL might have minor rendering or input problems.
